descriptionHtml:
Alona is  an archer that levels with the player and is essential.  She carries leather armor, an ebony bow and one steel arrow.  Found sandboxing in front of Breezehome.

She'll have whatever body you have installed.

Required Files
-----------------
Apachii Skyhair 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Recommended
------------------
If you're like me and don't like the dunmer brow hump, use Better Females by Bella
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?

Installation
------------
Dump the files into your Skyrim Data folder and make sure the mod is selected in 'Data Files'.  Or use a mod organizer.
author: Lucius Aries
